format:
  revealjs: 
    theme: 
      - simple

    width: 1600

    hash-type: number
    hash-one-based-index: true

    auto-stretch: false

      numbers: true
    slide-number: true
    center: false
    center-title-slide: true
    preview-links: auto
    progress: true
    history: false
    touch: true
    keyboard: true

    link-external-icon: true
    link-external-newwindow: true

    include-after-body:

    pointer:
      alwaysVisible: false
      pointerSize: 20

revealjs-plugins:
  - pointer
  - attribution
  - codefocus
